Key Match Events: Axar Patel named player of the match for his 3-23
Post-Match Reflections: England captain Jos Buttler: 'India outplayed us, certainly.'
India captain Rohit Sharma: 'I thought we adapted to the conditions.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the T20 World Cup semi-final: India v England
Others: England were dismissed for 103 in 16.4 overs, chasing 172
India posted 171-7 after Rohit Sharma hit a fine fifty
